mapper.select: SELECT rnum, ccode, pcode, pname, pbrand, pprice, pdate, enabled FROM( SELECT rownum AS rnum, ccode, pcode, pname, pbrand, pprice, pdate, enabled FROM ( SELECT pca.ccode AS ccode, pca.pcode AS pcode, prod.pname AS pname, prod.pbrand AS pbrand, prod.pprice AS pprice, prod.pdate AS pdate, prod.enabled AS enabled FROM pcategory pca JOIN product prod ON pca.pcode = prod.pcode WHERE ccode LIKE #{ccode}||'%' ORDER BY enabled, pdate DESC, pcode ) WHERE rownum <= #{pager.endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{pager.startRowNo}

SELECT prod.pcode, prodimg.pcolor AS pcolor, prodimg.imgurl1 AS imgurl1, prodimg.imgurl2 AS imgurl2, prodimg.imgurl3 AS imgurl3, prodimg.colorurl AS colorurl FROM product prod JOIN productimg prodimg ON prod.pcode = prodimg.pcode WHERE prod.pcode = #{pcode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PCATEGORY WHERE CCODE LIKE #{ccode}||'%'
SELECT pcode, pname, pcontent, pbrand, pprice, pdate, enabled FROM product WHERE pcode = #{pcode}
SELECT pamount FROM productstock WHERE pcode = #{pcode} AND psize = #{psize} AND pcolor = #{pcolor}
